General.Name: Triple Flag Precious Metals Corp
General.Description: Triple Flag Precious Metals Corp., a precious metals streaming and royalty company, engages in acquiring and managing precious metals, streams, royalties, and other mineral interests in Australia, Canada, Colombia, Cote d'Ivoire, Honduras, Mexico, Mongolia, Peru, South Africa, and the United States. It has a portfolio of streams and royalties providing exposure to copper, gold, silver, nickel, lead, and zinc. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: TD Canada Trust Tower, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2S1
